# Become a Sponsor

Thank you for considering sponsorship. Your support directly fuels the
development of:

- GitDigital Products  
- OpenGrantStack  
- GitDigital Credit Agency  
- Solana‑aligned automation and compliance tooling  
- Multi‑org governance systems  

## Sponsorship Benefits
- Recognition on sponsor pages  
- Priority feedback on features  
- Early access to new tools and documentation  
- Support for long‑term ecosystem stability  

## Sponsor Links
- **GitHub Sponsors:** https://github.com/sponsors/RickCreator87  
- **Buy Me a Coffee:** https://www.buymeacoffee.com/rickcreator87  

If you’d like a custom sponsorship arrangement, feel free to open an issue or
reach out directly.
